title: Enhance your hearing through our four-step process

steps.title: BOOKING
steps.description: Book your unique and personalized experience online or over the phone. Our mobile hearing clinic will come to your home at a time thatâ€™s most convenient for you.

steps.title: ASSESSMENT
steps.description: You will be guided through a full diagnostic hearing test and evaluation with our ear health professional. We include a full needs assessment of lifestyle requirements followed by the necessary prescription recommendations and schedule follow-up care services.

steps.title: FITTING
steps.description: We will schedule your hearing aid fitting at your convenience. Your recommended prescriptive medical device will be made to fit your required thresholds and comfort level. We use subjective and objective measures to confirm your new hearing aids are working to your satisfaction.

steps.title: FOLLOW-UP
steps.description: We will book another follow-up appointment with our professional. They will make any necessary adjustments to improve your comfort level and ensure a superior fit and adoption of your new medical device.
